history.narrative: Law 14-285, the “District Anti-Deficiency Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-811, which was referred to Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 3, 2002, and December 17, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 22, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 14-619 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-285 became effective on April 4, 2003.
